snippet: The wife of an Army officer says she was denied membership in a group for military spouses at Fort Bragg because she is a lesbian.
abstract: Ashley Broadway, wife of female Army officer, says she was denied membership to Association of Bragg Officers’ Spouses at Fort Bragg in North Carolina because she is married to a woman.
lead_paragraph: The wife of an Army officer says she was denied membership in a group for military spouses at Fort Bragg because she is a lesbian.

headline.main: North Carolina: Army Wife Says She Was Excluded as a Lesbian
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Army Wife Says She Was Excluded as a Lesbian
